_description: Proverbial advice on the value of study — two couplets translating ‘Viue vacans studio, quasi numquam sis moriturus…’ which precedes it in both instances in John Grimestone’s sermon notes

NLS18721.Transcription:
Bisiliche ȝef þe to loreAls þu suldest liuen
                    eueremoreBut fle senne in ich a playAs to morwe sulde ben þi
                    dedday
